MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 11-NOV-2020 19:52.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a fault with the power in the EH33 postcode area of Tranent. This is causing intermittent supply and reduced power to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4:55PM. Our next available engineer will attend site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:56 PM on Wednesday, 11 November 2020.
